Well if my characters get shot with that thing they aren't going to die,
they will just get blasted and that's it, or else maybe my characters would
get big blasters and shoot at Liono and Tigerhawk, see what I mean? It's
moding to use something that powerful, and my characters aren't selling no
Nemesis fusion cannon....
